turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order the Caffe Latte from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location would you like to order this drink from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to have the coffee sent from the Starbucks on 201 Powell St in San Francisco, California

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, what size would you like your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande should work

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any milk added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% milk should be fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream, honey, or anything else added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Some whipped cream would be great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any other questions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the calories in the drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 190 calories

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What about the total fat?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 7g total fat

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much sugar is in the drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 18g of sugar

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, that should be it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at Starbucks 201 Powell St and should be ready for pickup shortly

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, the receipt will be sent as a text message to your mobile device, goodbye.
